name: Requesting Permission to Not Die
description:
You gotta make it back to Earth, but not so fast! You don't get to just control the ship all willy-nilly. You gotta follow protocol!

Protocols

1. Select the maneuver you wish to perform.

2. Call Houston via Radio and request permission to perform the maneuver.

3. If request Granted, notify the crew via Intercom to prepare for the maneuver.

4. Once crew has Confirmed, turn the key to unlock the molly-guard.

5. Press and HOLD the red button to perform the maneuver.

Hazards

Watch out for asteroids and nearby stars.

Your fuel can only burn so much at a time. Let it recharge.

Goal

Make it back to Earth in one piece!
